Speaking at geekSessions 1.2

I will be on the panel at GeekSessions 1.2: Designing Beyond the Database on October 2nd in San Francisco.

I will be talking about the backend systems used to power bloglines.

Get your tickets now, before they are all gone. See y’all there.
